title: Third Shift Musings - One Piece Episode #6
subtitle: The story of Chouchou, one loyal (and mean) ass dog
author: Janet G
description: A detailed episode review and analysis focusing on Chouchou's emotional story. The article is behind a paywall but provides in-depth commentary on the episode's themes and character moments.

title: One Piece (4Kids) Episode 6: Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy | Sub/Dub Comparison
author: The Anime Madhouse
description: A detailed comparison examining differences between the original Japanese version and the 4Kids English dub of Episode 6, analyzing changes in dialogue, censorship, and localization choices.

title: Episode 6 - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Comprehensive wiki page detailing Episode 6 including plot summary, character debuts, production credits, manga chapters covered, trivia, and broadcast information.

title: Chouchou - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Detailed character page for Chouchou including his backstory, personality, relationships, and all appearances throughout the series.

title: Mohji - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Mohji detailing his role as Beast Tamer and first mate of the Buggy Pirates, his abilities, personality, and all appearances.

title: Richie - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Richie, Mohji's lion companion, including physical characteristics, abilities, and role in the Buggy Pirates.

title: Boodle - One Piece Wiki
author: One Piece Wiki Contributors
description: Character page for Boodle, mayor of Orange Town, detailing his background as town founder, his personality, and relationships with townspeople.

title: The One Piece Podcast - 4'ced To Watch 4Kids #2: Buggy Balls
author: Steve & Alex
description: Podcast episode reviewing the 4Kids version of the Orange Town arc (Episodes 5-8), including Episode 6. Discusses the adaptation choices and changes made for the English broadcast.

title: One Piece Watchers - Orange Town Arc Review
author: One Piece Watchers
description: Podcast reviewing the Orange Town arc (Episodes 4-8), which includes Episode 6's emotional Chouchou storyline.

title: "One Piece" Desperate Situation! Beast Tamer Mohji vs. Luffy! (TV Episode 1999)
author: IMDb
description: IMDb page for Episode 6 with rating of 7.6/10, featuring episode information, cast, and user reviews.

title: Who is ChouChou in One Piece?
author: Sportskeeda Wiki
description: Character profile article about Chouchou, explaining his role, backstory, and significance in the Orange Town arc.

title: Who is Richie in One Piece?
author: Sportskeeda Wiki
description: Character profile article about Richie, Mohji's lion companion, explaining his abilities and role in the Buggy Pirates.

title: One Piece OST - Mother Sea
author: Kohei Tanaka
description: The emotional soundtrack 'Mother Sea' which made its first appearance in Episode 6 during the scene where Luffy gives dog food to Chouchou. This track would become One Piece's signature emotional music.

title: One Piece OST - Mother Sea (First Part) [Extended Version]
author: Kohei Tanaka
description: Extended version of the Mother Sea soundtrack that debuted in Episode 6.
